mapper.select: SELECT A.ialbum, A.album_title AS albumTitle, A.album_contents AS albumContents, A.created_at AS createdAt, B.album_pic AS albumPic FROM t_album A JOIN t_album_pics B ON A.ialbum = B.ialbum GROUP BY A.album_title ORDER BY A.ialbum DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}

SELECT F.ifull_notice as iFullNotice , F.full_title as fullTitle, T.teacher_nm as writer, F.full_notice_fix as fullNoticeFix, F.created_at as createdAt FROM t_full_notice F JOIN t_teacher T ON F.iteacher = T.iteacher where F.full_notice_fix = 1 ORDER BY F.created_at DESC
